39.movie_plot: Two Western bank/train robbers flee to Bolivia when the law gets too close.

176.movie_plot: A wrongly convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a game show.

107.movie_plot: When love drive you Mad 2 the Max...

69.movie_plot: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath that only two teenagers and a group of psychics can stop.

147.movie_plot: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona, are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

4.movie_plot: "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

58.movie_plot: A group of young upper-class Manhattanites are blithely passing through the gala debutante season, when an unusual outsider joins them and stirs them up.

29.movie_plot: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

162.movie_name: Escape from the Planet of the Apes (1971)
162.movie_plot: The world is shocked by the appearance of three talking chimpanzees, who arrived mysteriously in a U.S. spacecraft. They become the toast of society, but one man believes them to be a threat to the human race.

112.movie_plot: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.

139.movie_plot: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

135.movie_plot: A man robs a bank to pay for his lover's operation; it turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.

87.movie_plot: A newly engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must pay a call to the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-N-Furter.

1.movie_plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.

164.movie_plot: A comet wipes out most of life on Earth, leaving two Valley Girls fighting against cannibal zombies and a sinister group of scientists.

64.movie_plot: The story of Wyatt Earp as he interacts and battles other famous figures of the Wild West era.

120.movie_name: Back to the Future Part III (1990)
120.movie_plot: Enjoying a peaceable existence in 1885, Doctor Emmet Brown is about to be killed by Buford "Mad Dog" Tannen. Marty McFly travels back in time to save his friend.

167.movie_plot: When a litter of Dalmatian puppies are abducted by the minions of Cruella de Vil, the parents must find them before she uses them for a diabolical fashion statement.

104.movie_plot: A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo.

24.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
24.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

148.movie_name: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace (1987)
148.movie_plot: The Man of Steel crusades for nuclear disarmament and meets Lex Luthor's latest creation, Nuclear Man.

113.movie_plot: A "typical" day in the life of The Beatles, including many of their famous songs.

131.movie_plot: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

52.movie_plot: There is panic throughout the nation as the dead suddenly come back to life. The film follows a group of characters who barricade themselves in an old farmhouse in an attempt to remain safe from these bloodthirsty, flesh-eating monsters.

98.movie_plot: When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral Kirk resumes command of the Starship Enterprise in order to intercept, examine and hopefully stop the intruder.

25.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

156.movie_plot: A glowing green orb - which embodies ultimate evil - terrorizes a young girl with an anthology of bizarre and fantastic stories of dark fantasy, eroticism and horror.

19.movie_plot: A video game based on Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991).

93.movie_plot: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

51.movie_plot: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

3.movie_plot: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

127.movie_plot: Brian is born on the original Christmas, in the stable next door. He spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

95.movie_plot: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high flying masked hero.

21.movie_plot: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

180.movie_plot: As part of a fertility research project, a male scientist agrees to carry a pregnancy in his own body.

134.movie_plot: Grossly overweight yet good-hearted professor Sherman Klump takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.

108.movie_plot: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

124.movie_plot: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives rise to a super-intelligent chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

146.movie_plot: Two veteran salesmen dissect a sales pitch to a particular client, through their young protégé.

54.movie_plot: The extracurricular king of Rushmore preparatory school is put on academic probation.

101.movie_name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home (1986)
101.movie_plot: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

159.movie_plot: Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, explore a world in which every human appetite, no matter how noble or depraved, can be indulged without consequence.

32.movie_plot: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

182.movie_plot: When two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

89.movie_name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1963)
89.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

71.movie_plot: A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.

116.movie_plot: Merlin the magician helps Arthur Pendragon unite the Britons around the Round Table of Camelot, even as dark forces conspire to tear it apart.

166.movie_plot: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.
